postTitle: My neighbor keeps parking in my spot and leaving passive aggressive notes on MY car
postBody: I've lived in this apartment complex for 3 years. We have assigned parking spots. My neighbor moved in 6 months ago and has decided that my spot is actually theirs because it's closer to the building entrance. Every time I park in MY assigned spot, I come back to find a note on my windshield calling me inconsiderate...

clues.topComment: "NTA. Document everything and report to your landlord."
clues.sidebarRule: Rule 7: No posts about interpersonal conflicts
